project.description:
Following API: -suiteName, -configName, -firmwareVersionMain, suiteName - name of the predefined suite, e.g. Sanity440Lync_basic configName - name of the predefined session config, e.g. Sanity440LyncConfig firmwareVersionMain - name of the firmware file which should be test, e.g. UC430HD_2.0.3.16 1. Before running, put a firmware version to \\isr0214-34401\firmwares , also it is need to put relevant firmwares for other phones. If tested firmware is UC440HD_3.0.0.65, it is need also to put all other available firmwares: UC430HD_3.0.0.65, UC420HD_3.0.0.65, UC405_3.0.0.65 (note that for 405 ther is no 'HD' in firmware name); 2. Example for run: tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_3.0.0.65.img
Should work on 10.59.1.46 - ippAuto

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: curl -s http://ippauto/index.php/status/show.xml | findstr status.free./status if %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( echo net use... net use j: "\\netapp1\Vopp tech Support\CMBU R&D\IP Phone\4xx IPP Versions\Lync\int_delivery\2.0.15" net use z: \\10.59.0.87\Firmwares REM isr0214-34401 = 10.59.0.87 echo dir j: dir /o-d /B j: > LASTBL.txt set /P LASTBL=<LASTBL.txt IF EXIST SaveLASTBL.txt ( set /P SaveLASTBL=<SaveLASTBL.txt ) else ( set SaveLASTBL=1 ) echo %LASTBL%==%SaveLASTBL% IF NOT %LASTBL%==%SaveLASTBL% ( move /Y LASTBL.txt SaveLASTBL.txt IF NOT EXIST z:\UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img copy /Y J:\%LASTBL%\440HD\UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img z:\ IF NOT EXIST z:\UC430HD_%LASTBL%.img copy /Y J:\%LASTBL%\430HD\UC430HD_%LASTBL%.img z:\ IF NOT EXIST z:\UC420HD_%LASTBL%.img copy /Y J:\%LASTBL%\420HD\UC420HD_%LASTBL%.img z:\ IF NOT EXIST z:\UC405_%LASTBL%.img copy /Y J:\%LASTBL%\405\UC405_%LASTBL%.img z:\ c: cd C:\IpPhoneAutomation\ModifeidIterations\ATA tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_%LASTBL%.img ) )
